com.google.mu.util.graph.GraphWalker

Package
Description
com.google.mu.util.graph
Stream-based incremental graph algorithms.

  • Uses of GraphWalker in com.google.mu.util.graph

    Methods in com.google.mu.util.graph that return GraphWalker
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <N> GraphWalker<N>
    Walker.inGraph(Function<? super N,? extends Stream<? extends N>> findSuccessors)
    Returns a Walker to walk the graph topology (possibly with cycles) as observed by the findSuccessors function, which finds successors of any given graph node.
    static <N> GraphWalker<N>
    Walker.inGraph(Function<? super N,? extends Stream<? extends N>> findSuccessors, Predicate<? super N> tracker)
    Similar to Walker.inGraph(Function), returns a Walker that can be used to traverse a graph of nodes.
